allow: Bash("C:\\Program Files\\PostgreSQL\\17\\bin\\psql.exe" "postgresql://postgres.bydkzxqmgsvsnjtafphj:1SRhjfokCsGJm77N@aws-1-us-east-1.pooler.supabase.com:5432/postgres" -c "UPDATE project_blocks SET searchable_text = data->>''content'', updated_at = NOW\(\) WHERE project_id = ''X24-RB01'' AND block_type = ''text-content'' AND data->>''content'' IS NOT NULL RETURNING id, LEFT\(searchable_text, 80\) as preview;")

Bash("C:\\Program Files\\PostgreSQL\\17\\bin\\psql.exe" "postgresql://postgres.bydkzxqmgsvsnjtafphj:1SRhjfokCsGJm77N@aws-1-us-east-1.pooler.supabase.com:5432/postgres" -c "UPDATE project_blocks SET searchable_text = \( SELECT string_agg\(f->>''title'' || '': '' || COALESCE\(f->>''detail'', f->>''value'', ''''\), '' | ''\) FROM jsonb_array_elements\(data->''findings''\) f \), updated_at = NOW\(\) WHERE project_id = ''X24-RB01'' AND block_type = ''key-findings'' RETURNING id, LEFT\(searchable_text, 100\) as preview;")

Bash("C:\\Program Files\\PostgreSQL\\17\\bin\\psql.exe" "postgresql://postgres.bydkzxqmgsvsnjtafphj:1SRhjfokCsGJm77N@aws-1-us-east-1.pooler.supabase.com:5432/postgres" -c "UPDATE project_blocks SET searchable_text = \( SELECT string_agg\(COALESCE\(s->>''title'', ''''\) || '': '' || COALESCE\(s->>''description'', ''''\), '' | ''\) FROM jsonb_array_elements\(data->''steps''\) s \), updated_at = NOW\(\) WHERE project_id = ''X24-RB01'' AND block_type = ''workflow-steps'' RETURNING id, LEFT\(searchable_text, 100\) as preview;")
